values: So on Monday I returned from COACHELLA(Indio, California). Yes this post is a wee bit late. I've had a busybusybusy week at school. Though at Coachella I had an amazingg time which was great. Took MANY pictures fortunately. I went over there with my sisters & their boyfriends. We were able to stay in a nice hotel & everything. Little did we know it was even HOTTER than expected... I saw so many bands such as METRIC, The Yeah Yeah Yeahs,Wolfmother,Madonna, Franz Ferdinand, SIGUR ROS & so many more. haha when we chilled& relaxed on the grass in the bright sun. haha yeahh so the first bands we got to see on Saturday, we actually got pretty upfornt near the stage for, where we saw Nine Black Alps, Wolfmother & Clap Your Hands Say Yeah. That was a great way to start off Coachella. Lead singer of the The Nine Black Alps. They were awesome. The band Wolfmother. They were fun enough to get us all hyped up. Clap Your Hands Say Yeah- they were alright but I really enjoyed them when they played that one certain song. !!Hah yes I was able to see Kanye West too with Andrea ♥ ♥ SIGUR ROS- I'd have to say besides The Yeah Yeah Yeahs, they were the BEST there. It was truly enticing. Not only did the audience get into a nice& peaceful state, but the band was also so into playing their music it was just great-AND at the time the sun was setting- perfect timing. I am very lucky I got the chance to see them there. Too bad we couldn't get closer to stage:/ Franz Ferdinand- Just great. The music & songs were just enjoyable enough. Then it was Depeche Mode-pretty nice; I just danced to most of their stuff. Then the second day-- METRIC!! It was too crowded but listening outside of the tent was still pretty chill. The sun setting that day The Yeah Yeah Yeahs. amazing concert. period. Then what do you know- as one of the last things we do, we( well my sister Andrea & I go rush off and hurry to go to Madonna- and guess what, we were like 15 minutes EARLY, and on top of that she was a half hour late hahaah. But man when we got there the WHOLE tent was already crowded all the way across to the nextdoor stage. But luckily there was a screen. That was PURE craziness being there to watch Madonna. I loved it when she sung "Hung Up on you" but sadly she didn't really sing some of her great 80s songs I love so much. Yup so that was fun. And later on we left right after Massive Attack then Tool played..I wanted to stay to see Scissor Sisters but everybody else was exhausted & complaining so we left. & yesss, the infamous desert wind power energy sighting. We got to see some more bands or part of their shows- which I didnt get any pictures of such as Daft Punk,(wow!), Bloc Party,White Rose Movement, Matisyahu, Sleater-Kinney, etc, & a few more. But there were a few bands we weren't able to see which I REALLY wanted to, but couldn't cuz we obviousily came a wee bit late or just didn't get the opportunity - Mates of State, The Like,The Murs,Minus the Bear, Ladytron, She Wants Revenge,Octopus Project, Head Automatica... Though Coachella 2006-simply amazing. So different than last year's but was just as much of a great time. But beware; wearing jeans in over 100 degrees weather isn't the best idea.

sorry guys, i know its sudden, but there are some people i don't want reading my journal. anyways, if you're not added already-- + comment to be added. +add me FIRST. or i won't add you. +you have to comment at least every once in awhile. +that means, not just once & then acting like you're dead. +i MIGHT not add you, but thats hardly unlikely cause I'm pretty friendly & like meeting new people, even with different interests. Thank You <3 PS. Maybe some journal entries might still be public.

i'm just finding out more & more people have livejournal. like more of my friends have it, but not just that, but like EVERYBODY. its probbaly the 'In' thing to do right now along w/ MySpace, i believe haha. don't you guys think? its just like these internet things are SLOWLY taking over. its already taken over me, im addicted :) ohh nothing else on my mind right now, just happy its gonna be a 3 day weekend. really need one. ♥, jen.niferrrrrr <Edit/>i was sick today so i stayed home from school...but i watched the movie The Notebook, since i bought it like last weekend & haven't watched it yet. that movie- LOVE. it made me happy<3 but kinda sad too.

Valnetine's Day is lame. most of the time.

unless you have a REAL love to share it with.

but then again, why can't every day of the year be to celebrate love & the ones we love?

i just don't get it.

We were lovers, we were kissers We were holders of hands; we were make-believers just losing time You said you'd rather live in T.V. land and then say that you can but you don't That's heartless and I will not cry... I remember it was summer; I was out of my head but you would You're selfish and a waste of space BUT I'm STILL in LOVE.yeah I'm still in LOOOOOVE... --THE STILLS. has anyone at all heard that song? its pure love. ♥

haha well now its over...im sad (: its usually that time of year i always wait for, & then when it comes, when it finally does, then its over. this is some stuff i got The Used- In love & death CD (finally)!, gift card for AE, gift card for best buy, matching heart pajamas, clinque make-up, a bath & body works cosmetics bag, 50$,2 pairs of earrings, a diaomand heart key chain, victorias secret buddy spray+ lotion, tweety braclet + THE DIGITAL CAMERA. & thats pretty much it... because my BIRTHDAY is coming up on Jan 15th. anyways! :) im gonna be 17, jeez that sounds so big to me haha... now what i think im gonna spend my best buy gift money on will definetly be THE KILLERS cd. i mustmustmustmust get it. im gonna take some pics this week with my digital camera & im gonna post them on here :D well im pretty much looking forward for another 2 relaxing weeks without school. Merry Christmas everybody! <3 ♥ JEN.niferr

woot. been a WEEK since i updated. mmkay, now that I just read it, it wasn't such a positive entry. im real happy its break now. i really need it, school was driiving me tired =/ most of all im excited its christmas. always has been my favorite time of the year.im not going to do anything really, just aunt & grandma are coming over. cant WAIT till i get the digital camera. my computer has a stuupid virus again. its going slower. and most of the time stuupid internet explorer isnt working,i can hardly get to any websites. so, beccuase of that i dont know if it will take longer to upload my pics, but i plan on taking some pics anyways on saturday or sunday/ monday. hopefully i can get them up. if so, ill post some! & now that i have a digital camera, then i can post pics regularly ! :D thats what i love about it. well i didnt do anything really eciting this week. starting of on sunday we had a LITTLE life teen xmas party. not that many people went. oh well. at least LESLEY did. she didnt go to school friday, so i couldnt give her her gift thingy yet. we're gonan hang out this week. shes just the KOOLEST. mhmm.:) well on tuesday night andrea & i got GIAN to come over. we gave him his present. i hope he likes it. he better. so we just went with him to best buy, he wanted to take us there for some reason. turned out, he took us there to buy us CDs with this gift certificate bonus he got. how rad that was=) so i got 2 cds, Snow Patrol- Final Straw & Green Day-American Idiot. i LOVE both the cds. they're awesome, thanks gian. i still plan on getting more CD's though. like, The Killers. i really am DYINGto get it. well yeah, thats pretty much what has been going on. hopefully ill get some gift certifcates to go shopping. i really need some new clothes again:D " it started out a with a kiss, how did it end up like this? it was only a KISS, it was only a kiss.."

hey kids yess its 2 days till friday im so excited then its winter break, yayy! my school gets 3 weeeks off. how awesome is that? i really need this break. so what are some of you people doing? im not doing anything which is getting out of the state or whatnot, i just might go up to the snow with my family or something like that. i really really have to do well on my geometry test this friday, or else im in real deep trouble.(: yeah, thats becuase math has ALWAYS been my worth subject. nothing really exciting has happened these past 2 days. life night was, uh what you would call,'a fun lesson' haha duane ofcourse made it fun as usual. oh & steve came & visited! which was a total surprise for all of us. it was great seeing him , its not the same without him still. he was like, the COOLEST core. haha. yeah so life night was fun because of that. again im so happy about my digital camera i cant wait till i get it again on christmas. im DEFINETILY gonna take lots & lots of pics. for journalism this month's issue i did an article on ONLINE JOURNALS. how funny is that, cuz im writing in one right now. i thought it would be kind of interesting since i have a livejournal, and there's still some people who have NO IDEA about it. well otherwise, things are pretty boring:) im gonna make plans with lesley & still need to make plans with toni. yea i really cant wait to get out and do things this winter break. ok, well i gotta go back now to do my muy estupido epsanol menu book project... PS if any of you guys have photoshop, please let me know!. ♥Jen-niferr.

I'll sing it one last time for you Then we really have to go You've been the only thing that's right In all I've done And I can barely look at you But every single time I do I know we'll make it anywhere Away from here Light up, light up As if you have a choice Even if you cannot hear my voice I'll be right beside you dear Louder louder And we'll run for our lives I can hardly speak I understand Why you can't raise your voice to say To think I might not see those eyes Makes it so hard not to cry And as we say our long goodbye I nearly do Light up... Slower slower We don't have time for that All I want is to find an easier way To get out of our little heads Have heart my dear We're bound to be afraid Even if it's just for a few days Making up for all this mess Light up, light up As if you have a choice Even if you cannot hear my voice I'll be right beside you dear

haha ok well i was grounded for the week, meaning i couldnt use the computer. why all of you are asking. cuz i didnt do my make-up homework over the weekend, even though i was like given a WEEK to complete all of it. so yeah, what does my mom decide to do? not let me use the computer. shes just kool like that, mhmm. when i wrote in on here on wedensday at school. haha, well im not 'grounded' anymore. =)

well last weekend i got my new digital camera, yayy! i was so happy, but i could only use it once before christmas. so i took some pictures, but they weren't the best,they didnt come out as i wanted, so im gonna take better pics right after christmas & ill post them all on here for the FIRST time for you all to see. yayy. & when we go back to school im gonna take pics of everyone& such. i just lovee having a digital camera, they're so much easier to use.

well school was ok this week. not anything that great. up to this point i have all A's& B's, one C & one D. oh well, thats much better than before.

♥Jen.
